home.title: Welcome to Amberg’s Waste Collection Information Service
home.description: Easily check the latest schedules and information for your area

zone_input.title: Enter your collection zone:
zone_input.help: Unsure what collection zone you're in? Visit
zone_input.help2: for further information or search for your waste collection by street name.
zone_input.feedback_invalid_code: Collection zone {{zone_code}} does not exist, please try again.

street_input.title: Enter your street:
street_input.feedback_invalid_street: Street {{street}} not found, please try again.

map.hint: Note: This map shows an overview of collection zones. It is not guaranteed that every street and zone assignment is accurately mapped. Not every colored or non-colored street necessarily belongs to the displayed zone. For precise information, please check your collection zone via the zone code or street input.

error_messages.server: Whoops! Our hamsters are running as fast as they can, but the server’s taking a little nap. Try again in a bit!
error_messages.zone: We looked everywhere for this collection zone… but found only an empty bin
error_messages.requests: Whoops! We know you’re eager to learn all about Amberg’s waste collection, but slown down your request speed so that we can keep up
